MShape¶

class MShape(shape)¶

Bases: mpylib.MNode

Purpose:

Base class for shape node related funtionality. Single instance of MShape respresents a single shape node in the current scene.
Extends:

MNode
Attributes:
PLUGINS
PLUGIN_DIR
apiTypeStr

(readonly) String containing the object’s type name.

Methods

Methods Documentation

duplicate(**kargs)¶

Duplicate the node with the given options. This overrides the default MNode version because Maya returns the Transform

kargs keywords arg supported by maya.cmds.duplicate

RETURNS MNode of the new node

>>> new_node = node.duplicate()
getDagPath()¶

Utility method for working with the Maya API. Returns MDagPath object for this mesh node.

RETURNS MDagPath

getParent()¶
Purpose:Returns the shape’s parent node
Returns:MTrans or None
parent(trans)¶
Purpose:Parents this shape to another transform. Functions just like maya.cmds.parent(shape=True, relative=True).
Parameters:trans – MNode or string name of a transform node
Returns:None
